title: Khloe Kardashian sports VERY plump pout and sexy LBD at new Good American store
text:
She's seen her Good American brand go from strength to strength.

And Khloe Kardashian looked every bit the CEO as she rocked the brand's 'bosswear' while inspecting her Miami pop up store on Thursday.

Trailed by cameras for Keeping Up With The Kardashians, the 35-year-old strutted through the Aventura Mall in a sexy $235 Good American tuxedo LBD.

But while she looked her very best, Khloe seemed self-conscious about her very plump pout.

Khloe Kardashian sports VERY plump pout and sexy LBD at new Good American pop up store ... as ex Tristain Thompson fawns over her Insta snaps

Working it: Khloe used a perfectly manicured hand to obscure her luscious lips as she walked to her store in the Florida mall

The mother-of-one used a perfectly manicured hand to obscure her luscious lips as she walked to her store in the Florida mall.

Spotting the cameras, she lifted a hand to her mouth, but gave her companions a warm smile.

While Khloe might have been uneasy, she had no need to worry about her appearance.

Her toned and trim figure was highlighted in the LBD, which she teamed with stilettos. The working mom accessorized with a diamond choker bearing the name of her daughter, one-year-old True.

Nailed it: Her hand boasted a fancy new manicure

Keeping Up With Khloe: Kardashian rocks $235 Good American 'bosswear' dress and a True choker to inspect her Miami store on Thursday

Move on over: Cameras for Keeping Up With The Kardashians trailed her

Khloe had earlier shared pictures of herself unwrapping the Good American outfit to Instagram Stories, calling it 'boss wear'.

The dress came inside a briefcase, with inspiring messages about being a female executive.

'This is how you boss!' read one note card. Khloe has been active on social media promoting her new range with the denim brand, which since launching three years ago this month, has made millions in sales.

Working mom: She wore a $235 tuxedo jacket-dress from her own brand and stilettos, accessorized with a diamond choker bearing the name of her daughter, one-year-old True

The original denim line has now extended to dresses, underwear, activewear and other items, and Khloe has two stand alone stores.

One man who certainly seems impressed by the results of her hard work is her ex, True's dad Tristan Thompson.

He has been busy creeping all over her social media, scattering love hearts and smiley love eye emojis on anything remotely sexy.

One man who certainly seems impressed by the results of her hard work is her ex, True's dad Tristan Thompson; here he comments on her Wednesday Instagram post

While Tristan may have regrets over losing Khloe, the basketball star has only himself to blame, after his multiple infidelities were exposed.

Luckily Khloe doesn't bare grudges and recently spoke about her co-parenting goals, as she vowed never to keep Tristan from seeing his daughter.

She said: 'It's hard, it's not easy for me. It would be easier for me to keep my daughter away and be like, "No, 'cause you hurt me."

'But, he never hurt True, him and I have our own relationship, and then Tristan and True have theirs. And I will never come in-between that, I don't believe in that.'

Working it: Tristan was quick to like a new photo of Khloe on her Good American page
description: She's seen her Good American brand go from strength to strength.
